654140.name: Realms of Arkania: Star Trail - Digital Deluxe Content
654140.description:
The Digital Deluxe Edition of Realms of Arkania: Star Trail grants access to the following additional ingame content and digital goods:

Additional Ingame Content


Dwarven Plate Armor
Equip your favorite party member with the exclusive plate armor forged from dark dwarven steel.

The Adventurer’s Cookbook
Enhance your crafting skills with additional, useful recipes.

The King’s Armory
Access the King’s Armory in Tiefhusen right from the beginning and choose three non-magical weapons to your liking.

Aventurian Legends
Start your game with a repertoire of 6 unique and well-known aventurian characters.

Digital Goods


Digitally Remastered Legacy Score
Enjoy the extensive digitally remastered version of the original Star Trail score from 1994. The 38 tracks are available as 320 kbps MP3 or lossless as FLAC.

Tracklist:
  • 101. Intro
  • 102. Elsurion Starlight
  • 103. Adherent of Phex
  • 104. Map
  • 105. Diary
  • 106. Rest and Shelter
  • 107. Brothel
  • 108. Temple
  • 109. Merchant
  • 110. Healer
  • 111. Hero Creation
  • 112. Kvirasim
  • 113. Gashok
  • 114. Lynch Mob
  • 115. Finsterkoppen
  • 116. Dwarven Pit
  • 117. Save / Load
  • 118. On the Way
  • 119. Battle
  • 120. Death
  • 121. Baron of Meresfeld
  • 201. Lowangen
  • 202. Swamp
  • 203. Fire Spirit
  • 204. Credits
  • 205. Options
  • 206. Inn
  • 207. Tavern
  • 208. Blacksmith
  • 209. Merchant (Version 2)
  • 210. Dialogue
  • 211. State
  • 212. Blood Pinnacles
  • 213. Tiefhusen
  • 214. Phex’s Temple
  • 215. Finale

Digital Maps
A selection of maps from the Svellt Valley is available for you to explore on screen or to be printed:
  • Travel Map of the Svellt Valley
  • City Maps of Lowangen and Tiefhusen

Wallpapers
Exclusive wallpapers are bringing Aventurians unique atmosphere to your desktop.

How to Access the Digital Goods
All digital goods can be found in the game’s Steam folder within “DigitalDeluxe" (Steam\SteamApps\common\Realms of Arkania – Star Trail) after the “Digital Deluxe Content” DLC package has finished downloading.
654140.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
